title: AUTO FILL
body:
just an idea and i already know im gonna get like 200 downvotes for it... but just think just for a second before you do downvote

what if we just logged in for a game... and all randomly got assigned roles and you just play the role you are assigned... there would be zero queue times and everyone has to deal with getting roles they dont want from time to time...

and if you play all roles then you improve over all as a better player of the game

ok now let the downvotes fly


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body:
And replace all modes with URF, which would solve all the autofill issues.

League is just not fun anymore; it is meant to be a game, not a stress-laden competition where you have to struggle against dumb luck to find any success or enjoyment.

how can the game be fun when all people do is cry and bitch about everything? 

i mean shit... just play the game smash some buttons have some fun win some lose some move on

Ironically, I think a version of Summoner's Rift where you are automatically assigned a spot would be kind of neat.  At least it would be better than the:

"Mid."
"Top."

"Sup."

"That's taken."
"Mid."
"nvm, bot"
"Is ADC taken?"
"Screw you - I'm going mid anyhow."
